snippet: A former Utah attorney general was found not guilty on Thursday of bribery and corruption charges after he was accused in a pay-to-play graft scandal, media said....

headline.main: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109
headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109

lead_paragraph: A former Utah attorney general was found not guilty on Thursday of bribery and corruption charges after he was accused in a pay-to-play graft scandal, media said.
